title: WebP to PNG Converter - Free & Online | miconvert.com
sub_title: Convert WebP images to PNG format online with transparency support, lossless quality, and no watermarks.
hint: Upload your WebP image to start converting...
description:
Need to convert WebP to PNG? This free online tool turns modern WebP files into high-quality PNGs while preserving transparency (alpha). PNG uses lossless compression and is widely supported across apps and platforms—perfect for logos, UI assets, and documents.

Notes: JPG does not support transparency (PNG does). If your WebP is animated, only the first frame will be converted to a static PNG. Colors are converted to sRGB for web consistency.

head.og_title: WebP to PNG Converter - Free & Online
head.og_description: Convert WebP images into PNG format with transparency support and lossless quality. 100% free, fast, and secure.

h1.title: Convert WebP to PNG Online
h1.description: Free and fast WebP to PNG converter with transparency support and lossless quality. Works instantly on any device, no signup required.

h2.title: Why Convert WebP to PNG?
h2.description:
WebP is efficient for the web, but PNG offers maximum compatibility and lossless output:

  • Universal Compatibility: Works across Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, and Android.
  • Transparency: Ideal for logos, icons, and UI graphics.
  • Editing & Design: Preferred by Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma, and more.
  • Documents: Insert PNG in Word, PowerPoint, and PDFs without surprises.

h2.title: How to Convert WebP to PNG Online
h2.description:
1. Click Upload WebP and select your file.
  2. Wait briefly while we process it securely.
  3. Click Download PNG to save your image.

This page converts one file at a time to ensure reliability and speed.

h2.title: WebP vs PNG Comparison
h2.description:
• File Size: WebP is usually 30–50% smaller; PNG is larger but lossless.
  • Transparency: Both support alpha; PNG is the professional standard.
  • Editing: PNG integrates cleanly with most design tools.
  • Use Case: WebP for websites; PNG for apps, docs, and design workflows.

h2.title: Supported Limits & Formats
h2.description:
• Accepted input: WebP (image/webp)
  • Max file size: 16 MB per file
  • Output: PNG (.png, image/png)
  • Animation: First frame only

h2.title: Troubleshooting
h2.description:
• Still too large? Use the PNG Compressor or resize before converting.
  • Colors look off: Output is converted to sRGB for consistent display.
  • Upload failed: Ensure the file is image/webp and ≤ 16 MB.

h2.title: Related Tools You Might Need
h2.description:
• PNG to WebP Converter – shrink file size for faster sites
  • PNG Compressor – reduce PNG size with quality control
  • Remove Background – make PNG transparent quickly
  • JPG to PNG Converter – switch other formats to PNG

faq.question: Is this WebP to PNG converter free?
faq.answer: Yes, it’s completely free with no watermarks or hidden fees.

faq.question: Will transparency be preserved?
faq.answer: Yes. PNG fully supports alpha transparency and we keep it intact.

faq.question: Does converting reduce quality?
faq.answer: No. PNG uses lossless compression, so you retain original visual detail.

faq.question: Do you support animated WebP?
faq.answer: Animated WebP is converted to a static PNG using the first frame.

faq.question: What is the maximum file size?
Can I convert multiple files at once?
faq.answer: This page converts one file at a time for stability. Repeat the process for additional images.

faq.question: Are my files secure?
faq.answer: Yes. Uploads are encrypted, processed on secure servers, and deleted automatically after conversion.

note: PNG files can be larger than WebP due to lossless compression—this is normal and preserves maximum quality.
